short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick and smart way to share website link from your desktop to your mobile device.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Link Share By Samy is a tool that will allow you to share any website link from your desktop to your mobile device.
Just visit any website and click on our Google extension icon, it will generate a QR Code for that website.
All you need to do is scan QR Code from your mobile device and visit that website within a seconds without any 3rd party app.
Nowadays you will find many famous smart phone brands are introducing built in QR Code Scanner feature in their camera.
